questions.question: What is the predominant color of the device's exterior?
What is the overall shape of the external housing?
What material appears to be used for the device's casing?
How many USB ports are visibly present on the device?
What type of USB ports are depicted on the device's side?
Besides USB, what other type of card reader is integrated?

What is the apparent finish or texture of the device's surface?

What is the color of the USB port indicators?
Does the device seem to have any visible power indicator lights?
What is the apparent size relative to a typical smartphone?
Are there any visible vents or openings for cooling?
